nodes.text: Luran Gonthor was a Human male who served as a legitimate businessman in Coruscant during the Cold War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. When his workshop was taken by the Justicars, he couldn't prove ownership of the workshop without the deed, which was locked away deep inside the business. He tasked a Republic individual to travel to his workshop and in Justicar Territory and retrieve the deed.
Luran appears in the mission "Trouble in Deed" in Star Wars: The Old Republic.
